about.title: Passion for racing
about.subtitle: Our Story
about.paragraph1: Founded by passionate motorsport enthusiasts, our team has evolved from weekend racers to a professional racing organization with both real-world and virtual racing divisions.
about.paragraph2: With a dedicated crew of experienced drivers, engineers, strategists and coaches, we provide extraordinary trackday experiences and competitive simracing teams that push the boundaries of what's possible.

teams.title: Our teams
teams.description: Auriga Racing is active across multiple disciplines, from real-world in Fun Cup events to serious simracing competitions

track.title: Fun Cup
track.description: Our Fun Cup team competes in events across Europe, showcasing skill and precision in some of the most challenging circuits.

features.drivers: Professional drivers with years of experience

simracing.title: Simracing
simracing.description: Our Simracing division competes at a respectable level in virtual motorsports with serious engagement based on the principles and values ​​that build the team.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: Moments captured from our racing adventures, both on the track and in the virtual world

join.title: Join the team
join.description: Whether you're an experienced racer or just starting out, we're always looking for passionate individuals to join our teams. Auriga Racing provides opportunities for both track racing and simracing enthusiasts.
join.whyJoinUs: Why join us on track or/and online?

benefits.coaching: Access to professional coaching and development
benefits.events: Drive in national and international events
benefits.community: Be part of a passionate community of racers

event.requirements: Participants must have a valid driver's license and their own vehicle in good condition. Safety equipment will be checked before the event. Please arrive at least 30 minutes before the start time for registration and briefing.
